channel.title: CVE Feed for Janobe -- School Event Management System
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Janobe -- School Event Management System

item.title: CVE-2024-33990|2024-08-06T14:34:55.136Z -- janobe -- school%20event%20management%20system
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in School Event Management System affecting version 1.0. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted javascript payload to an authenticated user and partially take over their browser session via the 'id' and 'view' parameters in '/user/index.php'.

item.title: CVE-2024-33991|2024-08-06T14:37:59.761Z -- janobe -- school%20event%20management%20system
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in School Event Management System affecting version 1.0. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted query to the server and retrieve all the information stored in it through the 'view' parameter in '/eventwinner/index.php'.

item.title: CVE-2024-33993|2024-08-06T13:09:42.301Z -- janobe -- school%20event%20management%20system
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in School Event Management System affecting version 1.0. An attacker could create a specially crafted URL and send it to a victim to obtain their session details via the 'view' parameter in /candidate/index.php'.

item.title: CVE-2024-33991|2024-08-06T13:08:05.119Z -- janobe -- school%20event%20management%20system
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in School Event Management System affecting version 1.0. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted query to the server and retrieve all the information stored in it through the 'view' parameter in '/eventwinner/index.php'.

item.title: CVE-2024-33989|2024-08-06T13:39:11.941Z -- janobe -- school%20event%20management%20system
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in School Event Management System affecting version 1.0. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted javascript payload to an authenticated user and partially take over their browser session via the 'eventdate' and 'events' parameters in 'port/event_print.php'.

item.title: CVE-2024-33992|2024-08-06T13:08:16.723Z -- janobe -- school%20event%20management%20system
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in School Event Management System affecting version 1.0. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted query to the server and retrieve all the information stored in it through the 'view' parameter in '/student/index.php'.

item.title: CVE-2024-33994|2024-08-06T13:27:17.852Z -- janobe -- school%20event%20management%20system
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in School Event Management System affecting version 1.0. An attacker could create a specially crafted URL and send it to a victim to obtain their session details via the 'view' parameter in '/event/index.php'.

item.title: CVE-2024-33990|2024-08-06T13:08:46.813Z -- janobe -- school%20event%20management%20system
item.description: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in School Event Management System affecting version 1.0. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by sending a specially crafted javascript payload to an authenticated user and partially take over their browser session via the 'id' and 'view' parameters in '/user/index.php'.
